entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
